mapper.sql: id, goods_attribute_id, goods_good_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag
mapper.select: select DISTINCT a.id from pm_goods_rel_attribute_good a inner join pm_goods_attribute_value b on a.goods_attribute_id = b.product_attribute_id and b.is_custom = 0 where a.goods_attribute_id = #{goodsAttributeId} and a.del_flag=0 and b.del_flag = 0

select a.id,c.name,c.content as value from pm_goods a,pm_goods_rel_attribute_good b,pm_goods_attribute c where a.del_flag = 0 and b.del_flag = 0 and c.del_flag = 0 and a.id = #{goodsId} and a.id = b.goods_good_id and b.goods_attribute_id = c.id and c.type in (1,2)

select a.id,d.name,c.value from pm_goods a,pm_goods_rel_attribute_value_good b,pm_goods_attribute_value c,pm_goods_attribute d where a.del_flag = 0 and b.del_flag = 0 and c.del_flag =0 and d.del_flag = 0 and a.id = #{goodsId} and a.id = b.goods_id and b.goods_attribute_value_id = c.id and c.product_attribute_id = d.id;
